Communication - Class in common.communication
A class for the communications between client-side to server-side Includes all the elements required to transmit a valid message that is Serializable
Communication(Communication.CommunicationType) - Constructor for class common.communication.Communication
Constructor of a Communication object
Communication.ClientMessageType - Enum in common.communication
Determines the client message's type
Communication.CommunicationType - Enum in common.communication
The communication type of this communication instance QUERY_REQUEST: a client-server message for executing a single query TRANSACTION: a client-server message for multiple queries NOTIFICATION: a client-server message request for sending a notification CLIENT_SERVER_MESSAGE: a client-server message that is not a query SERVER_CLIENT_MESSAGE: a server-client message SELF: an inner-server query request
Communication.NotificationType - Enum in common.communication
Determines the notification's type
Communication.QueryType - Enum in common.communication
Determines the type of the SQL requested query
Communication.SecondaryRequest - Enum in common.communication
Determines the secondary request's type
Communication.ServerMessageType - Enum in common.communication
Determines the server message's type
